Let's sail away together
 Come along, just you and me
 to the land of never never
 Such a beautiful place to be
 
 We'll make a ship out of cotton candy
 And fill it with lollipops
 and we'll sail around the world
 'Til it stops.
 
 
 In the land of never never
 Sugarplums dance in the air
 Pots of gold at the ends of the rainbows
 Are really really there
 
 The birds eat gumdrops from Heaven
 And the cats don't have any clause
 If you ask me why, I'll just have to say
 Because.
 
 
 Look, there's an elephant flying
 With a puppy dog on his nose
 Listen, you'll hear noone crying
 Nothing dies...everything grows
 
 It's the land of never never
 How it got here nobody knows
 Like the seasons of the years
 I suppose.
 
 
 c 1980, 2007

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The Land of Never Never...
